<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/orgs/{orgId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves the details of the organization identified by the given `orgId`.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"orgId","in":"path","description":"Organization numeric identifier","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"organization":{"type":"object","properties":{"paying":{"type":"boolean","deprecated":true},"orgId":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"},"name":{"type":"string"},"fullName":{"type":"string"},"description":{"type":"string"},"location":{"type":"string"},"website":{"type":"string"},"logoId":{"type":"string"},"logoUrl":{"type":"string"},"memberId":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"},"memberRole":{"type":"string","enum":["owner","member","collaborator"],"title":"OrgRole"},"type":{"type":"string","enum":["academic","evaluating","pro","basic","internal"],"title":"OrgType"}},"title":"OrganizationDbDto"}},"title":"DescribeOrganizationResponse"}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["message"],"type":"object","properties":{"message":{"type":"string"}},"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}},"403":{"description":"Operation not allowed"}}}
